response.original_title: Fourplay - Between the Sheets Atmos Audio
response.overview: Now considered a defining release in the smooth jazz genre, Between The Sheets (1993) was smooth jazz group Fourplay's second studio album. The album takes its name from the sensuous ballad originally made famous by The Isley Brothers, with this version featuring vocals from legendary soul singer Chaka Khan and Earth, Wind & Fire's Philip Bailey. Between The Sheets is certified gold by the RIAA, peaking at No. 2 on the Billboard Top Jazz Albums chart and No. 15 on the Billboard Top R&B Albums chart.  Tracklist: Chant Monterey Between The Sheets Li'l Darlin' Flying East Once In The A.M. Gulliver Amoroso A Summer Child Anthem Song For Somalia Tokyo Rain
response.title: Fourplay - Between the Sheets Atmos Audio
